product_overview: Chamos Barber App is a comprehensive barbershop management system tailored for the Chilean market with a Venezuelan touch, providing seamless booking, sales, attendance, and administrative capabilities.
core_goals: Enable customers to easily book hair and beard services with preferred barbers and real-time availability.
Facilitate efficient sales processing and receipt generation through an integrated POS system.
Provide accurate attendance tracking for barbers with GPS validation to ensure punctuality and presence.
Offer administrators a centralized dashboard for monitoring sales, appointments, staff shifts, and financials.
Enhance customer service with an AI-powered appointment assistant leveraging conversational AI and a knowledge base.
key_features: Appointment Booking: Service and barber selection, date/time slot picking, and WhatsApp notification integration.
Point of Sale (POS) System: Sales management for walk-ins and appointments, thermal receipt generation, cash flow tracking, and payment method support.
Staff Attendance System: GPS-validated smartphone check-in/out and daily presence monitoring dashboard.
Admin Dashboard: Real-time sales and booking analytics, pricing and duration management, shift and holiday configuration, financial reporting and commissions tracking.
AI Appointment Assistant: Gemini-powered conversational interface assisting customers with bookings and common inquiries.
user_flow_summary: Customer accesses booking page to select service, barber, and preferred date/time slot.
Customer confirms appointment and receives WhatsApp notification.
Barber marks attendance via smartphone GPS check-in/out on arrival and departure.
POS operator processes sales through the POS interface, generates thermal receipts, and manages daily cash flow.
Administrator reviews dashboards for sales analytics, staff attendance, and manages schedules and pricing.
User interacts with AI assistant for booking help and service information.
validation_criteria: Appointment booking reflects current availability and correctly updates on confirmation.
POS processes payments accurately and prints thermal receipts without errors.
Attendance system validates GPS location for check-in/check-out and logs times correctly.
Admin dashboard displays real-time, accurate sales and attendance data with correct commission calculations.
AI assistant provides accurate, relevant responses and successfully guides users through booking steps.
